name: com.unity.package-validation-suite
description: Unity Package Manager validation suite, used to evaluate a package's integrity before it's considered for publishing.  This is a Unity internal tool at the moment, no support will be provided for this package.

_upm.changelog:
- PVP: Add x-ray checks `PVP-{161,162}-1` to catch certain package dependency errors. (PVS-188)
- PVP: Now supports Unity 2018.4 or later (previously only supported 2019.2+).
- PVP: Work around Packman issue causing spurious `_fingerprint` errors in PVP-107-2. (PVS-1414)
